restaurant.name: All-American Bar and Grille
restaurant.dinnerMenu: /content/dam/rlv/Dining/Casual/all american bar and grille/All American Bar and Grille Dinner Menu.pdf
restaurant.shortDescription: This casual dining Las Vegas restaurant serves in-house “Rio Dry Aged” steaks and seafood cooked over a mesquite grill, plus salads and sandwiches.

restaurant.name: BK Whopper Bar
restaurant.shortDescription: Customize your WHOPPER® sandwich with your choice of 22 toppings at any hour of the day in the WHOPPER® bar Las Vegas restaurant at Rio All-Suite Hotel & Casino.

restaurant.name: BLT Steak
restaurant.shortDescription: Coming Soon to Bally's Las Vegas!

restaurant.name: Bacchanal Buffet
restaurant.shortDescription: Bacchanal Buffet features more than 500 items prepared by a team of master chefs in nine globally-inspired open kitchens.

restaurant.name: Bally's Steakhouse
restaurant.shortDescription: Classic steaks, chops and seafood are served in an elegant New England hunt club style atmosphere at the Bally’s Las Vegas steakhouse.

restaurant.name: Beach Club Bar & Grill
restaurant.shortDescription: Beach Club Bar and Grill is a seasonal poolside spot offering snacks and lunch poolside at the Flamingo Las Vegas Hotel and Casino’s Beach Club.

restaurant.name: Beijing Noodle No. 9
restaurant.shortDescription: Beijing Noodle No. 9 offers Northern Chinese cuisine in a friendly, casual atmosphere. The best restaurants in Las Vegas can only be found at Caesars.

restaurant.name: Betty's Diner & Cyber Cafe
restaurant.shortDescription: Satisfy your sweet tooth with ice cream, shakes and sundaes or fill up with a burger, dog or sandwich.

restaurant.name: Burger Brasserie
restaurant.shortDescription: Enjoy a true gourmet burger at Burger Brasserie, a lively Las Vegas restaurant offering a French interpretation of the meat-and-potatoes sports bar at Paris Las Vegas.

restaurant.name: Buzios Seafood Restaurant
restaurant.shortDescription: The freshest seafood in Las Vegas and traditional New England fare is served at Búzios Seafood Restaurant overlooking VooDoo Beach.

restaurant.name: Cafe Belle Madeleine
restaurant.shortDescription: Sweet or savory desires can be satisfied at Café Belle Madeleine, a Paris Las Vegas quick service restaurant serving freshly brewed coffee, espresso and cappuccino.

restaurant.name: Carlos 'n Charlie's
restaurant.dinnerMenu: /content/dam/flv/Dining/Casual/Carlos N Charlies/Carlos n Charlies Dinner Menu.pdf
restaurant.shortDescription: Get loose, get loud and get fun at Carlos’n Charlie’s, the Mexican casual restaurant’s first west coast location, at this Las Vegas restaurant.

restaurant.name: Carnaval Grill
restaurant.shortDescription: Carnaval Grill is now open and located directly behind our Carnival Court stage serving up your favorite grill items!

restaurant.name: Carnival World Buffet
restaurant.shortDescription: Choose from over 300 selections daily at the Carnival World Buffet, the best buffet in Las Vegas, at Rio All-Suite Hotel and Casino.

restaurant.name: Center Cut Steakhouse
restaurant.dinnerMenu: /content/dam/flv/Dining/Upscale/Center Cut Steakhouse/Center Cut Steakhouse Full Menu.pdf
restaurant.shortDescription: Mouth-watering steaks from Aspen Ridge Farms in Colorado are the centerpiece of Center Cut, the classic Flamingo Las Vegas steakhouse.

restaurant.name: Central by Michel Richard
restaurant.shortDescription: At Central, Chef Michel Richard serves American food with a French twist in a casual dining environment. For all the best restaurants in Las Vegas, try Caesars Palace.

restaurant.name: Coming Soon
restaurant.shortDescription: Guy Fieri to open new restaurant

restaurant.name: Cypress Street Marketplace
restaurant.shortDescription: Casual dining at Cypress Street Marketplace offers a wide variety of cuisines and specialty food. Find all the best Las Vegas restaurants at Caesars Palace.

restaurant.name: Earl of Sandwich
restaurant.shortDescription: Planet Hollywood guests enjoy Las Vegas’ best sandwiches 24 hours a day at Earl of Sandwich, where you’ll find fresh baked artisan bread and the finest ingredients.

restaurant.name: Eiffel Tower Restaurant
restaurant.shortDescription: Acclaimed French cuisine by Chef J. Joho is served in a fine dining room with stunning views inside the Eiffel Tower at this Paris Las Vegas restaurant.

restaurant.name: Emperor's Buffet
restaurant.shortDescription: The Emperor’s Buffet is the home of the daily brunch, offering endless combinations of mouth-watering Las Vegas dining experiences.

restaurant.name: Empress Court
restaurant.shortDescription: Dine on authentic Cantonese seafood at the Empress Court Chinese Restaurant, a premium Las Vegas restaurant at Caesars Palace Las Vegas.

restaurant.name: Events
restaurant.shortDescription: Book your event at Nobu Restaurant and Lounge.

restaurant.name: Flamingo Food Court
restaurant.shortDescription: The Flamingo Food Court puts together Las Vegas restaurants from Johnny Rockets, Bonanno’s Pizzeria, Pan Asian Express and L.A. Subs & Salads.

restaurant.name: Flavors, The Buffet
restaurant.shortDescription: Flavors is a Las Vegas buffet featuring live cooking stations, all-you-can-eat crab legs and gelato in one of the Las Vegas Strip’s most diverse buffets.

restaurant.name: Ginseng 3
restaurant.shortDescription: Exotic Asian flavors are yours to explore 24 hours a day at Ginseng 3, a restaurant at The Quad serving Japanese, Chinese and Korean cuisine all day and night.

restaurant.name: Gordon Ramsay BurGR
restaurant.shortDescription: Gordon Ramsay BurGR elevates the traditional burger experience by mixing comfort food with international-inspired fusions and fresh, quality ingredients.

restaurant.name: Gordon Ramsay Steak
restaurant.shortDescription: World Famous TV personality and accomplished chef Gordon Ramsay has opened his first Las Vegas restaurant, the new steakhouse and Paris Las Vegas fine dining gourmet room.

restaurant.name: Gordon Ramsay<br>Pub & Grill
restaurant.shortDescription: Gordon Ramsay Pub & Grill is the neighborhood restaurant conceptualized by the award-winning chef.  The 290 seat restaurant is the most authentic English pub experience in Las Vegas, as only a native UK chef can provide.

restaurant.name: Hamada of Japan
restaurant.shortDescription: For nearly a decade, Hamada of Japan has been a favorite Flamingo Las Vegas restaurant among those seeking authentic sushi and Japanese dishes.

restaurant.name: Hash House A Go Go
restaurant.shortDescription: “Twisted Farm Food” at breakfast, lunch and dinner make for meals that challenge your very imagination at this restaurant featured on Man V. Food.

restaurant.name: Ice Pan
restaurant.shortDescription: This Harrah’s Las Vegas restaurant serves ice cream custom-made made from dairy and soy bases combined with your choice of flavorings and mix-ins.

restaurant.name: Ichiban Sushi
restaurant.shortDescription: This casual Las Vegas sushi restaurant at Bally’s Las Vegas serves authentic sushi and popular Japanese dishes.

restaurant.name: In Room Dining
restaurant.shortDescription: Enjoy this exclusive menu, available only to guests of Nobu Hotel, created by Chef Nobu for your 24-hour in-room dining pleasure.

restaurant.name: JJ's Boulangerie
restaurant.shortDescription: JJ's Boulangerie is a Paris Las Vegas breakfast and sandwich café serving mouth-watering baguettes, sandwiches, salads and pizza.

restaurant.name: Java Coast
restaurant.shortDescription: More than just coffee, Java Coast serves juices, fruit smoothies and assorted baked goods near the Bally’s Las Vegas lobby.

restaurant.name: KGB: Kerry's Gourmet Burgers
restaurant.phone: 702-369-5000</P><h4 class="sub-col-highlight-title">Group Reservations</h4><p class="sub-col-highlight-text">For groups of 12 or more, please call 866-733-5827
restaurant.shortDescription: Chef Kerry Simon’s restaurant serves Las Vegas’ best burgers customized to your liking, along with signature snacks, sides and milkshakes.

restaurant.name: KJ Dim Sum & Seafood
restaurant.shortDescription: Rio Las Vegas Hotel and Casino guests can now enjoy a new dim sum menu and the signature tastes of favorite Las Vegas Chinese restaurant KJ Kitchen.

restaurant.name: Koi
restaurant.shortDescription: This Las Vegas Japanese restaurant’s trademark California accents have been imported from LA to Planet Hollywood Resort and Casino.

restaurant.name: La Creperie
restaurant.shortDescription: La Creperie is a Paris Las Vegas restaurant where you can walk up to a traditional bistro counter where delicate crepes are topped with sweet and savory ingredients.

restaurant.name: Le Cafe Ile St. Louis
restaurant.dinnerMenu: /content/dam/plv/Dining/Upscale/Le Caf‚ Ile St Louis/Cafe Ile St Louis Dinner Menu.pdf
restaurant.shortDescription: Enjoy the sights, sounds and tastes of Paris sidewalks at Café Ile St. Louis, a bustling restaurant overlooking the Paris Las Vegas casino floor.

restaurant.name: Le Provencal
restaurant.shortDescription: Passion foods collide in a rustic Provençal countryside setting at this regional French restaurant at Paris Las Vegas with Italian influences.

restaurant.name: Le Village Buffet at Paris Las Vegas
restaurant.shortDescription: The five regions of France are represented at this Las Vegas buffet by live-action stations and cottage dining rooms.

restaurant.name: Margaritaville
restaurant.shortDescription: Look for your lost shaker of salt over a Cheeseburger in Paradise and dive into the signature Volcano Nachos at Jimmy Buffett’s Margaritaville restaurant at Flamingo Las Vegas.

restaurant.name: Martorano's
restaurant.shortDescription: Italian-American chef Steve Martorano serves up beats and bites at this high-energy Las Vegas Italian restaurant at Rio All-Suite Hotel and Casino.

restaurant.name: Martorano's
restaurant.shortDescription: It’s Official! Steve Martorano is partnering with Paris Las Vegas to bring his restaurant to the Las Vegas Strip.

restaurant.name: Mesa Grill
restaurant.shortDescription: Brought to Caesars Palace Las Vegas by celebrity chef Bobby Flay, Mesa Grill Southwestern Restaurant features bold flavors and specialty margaritas.

restaurant.name: Ming's Table
restaurant.shortDescription: Your Ming’s Table dinner is prepared fresh to order and served in this Las Vegas Chinese restaurant’s colorful, contemporary atmosphere.

restaurant.name: Mon Ami Gabi
restaurant.shortDescription: Al fresco dining on the Las Vegas Strip, Mon Ami Gabi offers an extensive wine list and classic steak frites and fruits de mer at this Las Vegas restaurant.

restaurant.name: Munchbar
restaurant.shortDescription: Come take a break at Munchbar, a Las Vegas restaurant and pub where you can find all your favorite comfort foods on a menu created by renowned Chef Bryan Ogden.

restaurant.name: NOBU
restaurant.shortDescription: The ideal destination to be seen, socialize, and enjoy the unique cuisine of celebrated Chef Nobu Matsuhisa.

restaurant.name: NOBU
restaurant.shortDescription: Is the ideal destination to be seen, socialize, and enjoy the unique cuisine of celebrated Chef Nobu Matsuhisa.

restaurant.name: Nathan's Famous
restaurant.shortDescription: A taste of Coney Island - classic hot dogs topped with sauerkraut and mustard or chili and cheese at this quick Las Vegas restaurant near the Bally’s Las Vegas Race & Sports Book.

restaurant.name: Nosh
restaurant.shortDescription: Nosh serves bagel and croissant breakfast sandwiches along with made-to-order sandwiches, hot dogs and fresh desserts.

restaurant.name: Old Homestead Steakhouse
restaurant.shortDescription: Old Homestead Steakhouse at Caesars Palace offers fine dining in a Las Vegas restaurant inspired by the original Old Homestead, one of NYC’s most historic restaurants.

restaurant.name: Oyster Bar
restaurant.shortDescription: Belly up to the Oyster Bar at Harrah’s and reel in oysters, fresh caught fish, clam chowder, scallops and more at this longtime Las Vegas seafood favorite.

restaurant.name: P.F. Chang's
restaurant.shortDescription: Enjoy fresh, contemporary Chinese cuisine in P.F. Chang’s stylish, high-energy bistro environment in a Las Vegas restaurant at Planet Hollywood.

restaurant.name: Paradise Garden Buffet
restaurant.shortDescription: At Paradise Garden Las Vegas Buffet at, you can feast on cuisines from around the world while watching the wildlife in the Flamingo Las Vegas Hotel and Casino’s habitat.

restaurant.name: Payard Patisserie & Bistro
restaurant.shortDescription: The Payard Patisserie & Bistro  at Caesars Palace, unique among Las Vegas restaurants, contains an upscale bistro as well as a chocolate and pastry shop.

restaurant.name: Pho Da Nang Vietnamese Kitchen
restaurant.shortDescription: Pho Da Nang Vietnamese Kitchen is now open at Rio All-Suite Hotel & Casino. The new Rio Las Vegas restaurant provides guests fresh selections of authentic Vietnamese cuisine.

restaurant.name: Pink's Hot Dogs
restaurant.shortDescription: Experience a taste of the iconic Hollywood landmark Pink’s Hot Dogs right on the Las Vegas Strip, without the notorious lines of the original!

restaurant.name: Planet Dailies
restaurant.shortDescription: Planet Dailies is Planet Hollywood’s ever-changing Las Vegas coffee shop and café, where you can enjoy innovative bites in a technology-forward dining room.

restaurant.name: Promenade Food Court
restaurant.shortDescription: Take your rumbling stomach to the food court on Flamingo Las Vegas Hotel and Casino’s promenade for snacks from TCBY, Mrs. Fields or Java Detour.

restaurant.name: Quesadilla
restaurant.shortDescription: Mexican comfort food and margaritas are made to order at this affordable Las Vegas restaurant on the fifth floor of The Quad Resort & Casino.

restaurant.name: Rao's
restaurant.shortDescription: Come experience simple, honest, home cooking at Rao’s at Caesars Palace, voted one of the best Italian restaurants in Las Vegas.
restaurant.chef: Frank Pellegrino Sr., Frank Pellegrino Jr., Ron Straci, and Nicole Grimes

restaurant.name: Restaurant Guy Savoy
restaurant.shortDescription: Restaurant Guy Savoy at Caesars Palace has been called the best restaurant in Las Vegas, serving elegant French Cuisine in a fine dining environment.

restaurant.name: Royal India Bistro
restaurant.shortDescription: Spice up your dining experience with authentic North Indian cuisine at the Royal India Bistro at Rio Las Vegas.

restaurant.name: Ruth's Chris Steak House
restaurant.shortDescription: Steakhouse restaurant serving the best prime steak, that's sizzling hot.

restaurant.name: SEA: The Thai Experience
restaurant.shortDescription: Las Vegas diners can savor the exotic flavors of Thailand and Vietnam late into the night in a Bally’s restaurant with sleek, Bangkok-inspired modern design.

restaurant.name: Sbarro
restaurant.shortDescription: Quick bites like New York style or stuffed pizza slices and your favorite Italian dishes are served at this Las Vegas restaurant across from the Bally’s Las Vegas Race & Sports Book.

restaurant.name: Serendipity 3
restaurant.shortDescription: Serendipity 3, one of the great Las Vegas restaurants at Caesars Palace, serves fun and whimsical entrees and delectable desserts.

restaurant.name: Sidewalk Café
restaurant.shortDescription: Enjoy breakfast and lunch at this casual café, or opt for the Express Breakfast buffet. The Sidewalk Café at Bally’s Las Vegas serves classic breakfast favorites.

restaurant.name: Spice Market Buffet
restaurant.averageCheck: Mon-Thu Breakfast $15.99 Lunch $18.99 Dinner $27.99   Fri Breakfast $15.99 Lunch $18.99 Dinner $29.99  Sat Breakfast $18.99 Brunch $27.99 Dinner $29.99   Sun Breakfast $18.99 Brunch $27.99 Dinner $27.99
restaurant.shortDescription: Voted the best buffet in Las Vegas! The Spice Market Buffet at Planet Hollywood features fare from all around the world and tantalizing desserts.

restaurant.name: Sports Deli
restaurant.shortDescription: Enjoy burgers, bratwursts, wood-fired pizzas and sandwiches without missing a moment of the action at the Sports Deli, next to Las Vegas’ Rio All-Suite Hotel and Casino sports book.

restaurant.name: Starbucks
restaurant.shortDescription: Starbucks has two Las Vegas locations at Harrah’s Las Vegas, near hotel registration and on the second floor between Toby Keith’s and Ice Pan.

restaurant.name: Starbucks
restaurant.shortDescription: Open 24 hours a day, the Starbucks Coffee at Planet Hollywood serves up America’s most popular coffees and homemade pastries.

restaurant.name: Starbucks
restaurant.shortDescription: Find Starbucks Coffee at two locations at Rio Las Vegas Hotel and Casino, next to the São Paulo Café at Pavilion Corridor and next to the Ipanema Tower elevators.

restaurant.name: Steakhouse Bar
restaurant.shortDescription: Enjoy specialty martinis and indulgent appetizers at the Bally’s Las Vegas Steakhouse Bar.

restaurant.name: Sterling Brunch
restaurant.shortDescription: The most opulent Las Vegas fine dining is the Sterling Brunch at Bally’s Las Vegas, with bottomless premium Champagne, caviar and whole lobster.

restaurant.name: Strip House
restaurant.shortDescription: At Strip House, a premier Las Vegas steakhouse at Planet Hollywood, signature side dishes and infamous desserts accompany perfectly charred steaks.

restaurant.name: Sugar Factory American Brasserie

restaurant.shortDescription: Sugar Factory is a Paris Las Vegas restaurant serving breakfast, lunch, dinner and late-night dining to celebrities, club-goers and your everyday sweet tooth.

restaurant.name: São Paulo Café
restaurant.shortDescription: Start your day at Rio All-Suite Hotel and Casino with a visit to São Paulo Café for their signature coffees and traditional breakfast items.

restaurant.name: The Café at Harrah's
restaurant.shortDescription: This casual Harrah’s Las Vegas restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and late-night favorites.

restaurant.name: The Tequila Bar and Grill
restaurant.shortDescription: The Tequila Bar is a Las Vegas restaurant serving a "south of the border" taste including over 60 varieties of tequila, Mexican favorites, burgers and ribs.

restaurant.name: Toby Keith's I Love This Bar & Grill
restaurant.shortDescription: Live country music and down-home Southern favorites make Toby Keith’s Las Vegas restaurant at Harrah’s your kind of place.

restaurant.name: Tropical Breeze Café
restaurant.shortDescription: Flamingo Las Vegas Hotel and Casino’s casual dining café, Tropical Breeze features an island setting and a menu full of American favorites and island specialties.

restaurant.name: Village Seafood Buffet
restaurant.shortDescription: The Village Seafood Buffet at Rio Las Vegas Hotel and Casino is the only all-seafood, all-the-time, all-you-can-eat buffet in Las Vegas.

restaurant.name: VooDoo Steakhouse
restaurant.shortDescription: 50 stories above the neon of Las Vegas, VooDoo Steak is a spellbinding gourmet room serving Rio Las Vegas house-aged steaks and Cajun cuisine.

restaurant.name: Wine Cellar & Tasting Room
restaurant.shortDescription: The Rio Las Vegas Wine Cellar and Tasting Room is a hidden gem where you can enjoy wine pairings, international cheeses and spreads, chocolate tasting menus and over 100 wines by the glass.

restaurant.name: Yolös
restaurant.shortDescription: You only live once, so have a meal at this Las Vegas Mexican restaurant and sip of one of over 60 tequilas at this energetic cantina inside Planet Hollywood.
